amendment.description: To provide funding for the Election Assistance Commission to make discretionary payments to States affected by Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes during the 2005 season.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S3870-3872; text: CR S3871) To provide funding for the Election Assistance Commission to make discretionary payments to States affected by Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes during the 2005 season.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator Lott.
